Updated all social media links in the footer. They now point to each platform's login/homepage instead of auto-linking to accounts.

**Updated links:**
- **LinkedIn**: `https://www.linkedin.com/login`
- **Twitter/X**: `https://twitter.com/i/flow/login`
- **YouTube**: `https://www.youtube.com/` (homepage with login option)
- **GitHub**: `https://github.com/login`
- **WhatsApp**: Kept as `https://wa.me/919820459958` (direct contact link)

All links open in new tabs with proper security attributes (`target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"`). No linter errors. When official handles are ready, update these URLs to the specific profile pages.
